title: Product Detail Page Business Flow
description: Covers all user interactions on the product detail page including viewing product info, selecting quantity, and adding to cart.

steps.user_action: Open a product detail page from category or home page
steps.expected_behavior: Loads product image, title, price, and stock availability
Product information tab is shown by default

steps.user_action: Change product quantity using the input box
steps.expected_behavior: Quantity is updated in the selection box
Product with selected quantity is added to the cart
List of customer reviews is shown if available

steps.user_action: Click on 'Related Products' tab if available
Check if color or size options are available
steps.expected_behavior: Color and size options are displayed if available

steps.user_action: Click on product tags if available
steps.expected_behavior: Navigates to filtered product listings based on that tag

steps.user_action: Select from the dropdown of size or color options if available
steps.expected_behavior: Selected option is applied to the product
